untold.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to emphasize how bad something is
untold.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The rumours will do untold damage to his reputation.
The floods have caused untold misery to hundreds of homeowners.
untold.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used to emphasize that an amount or quantity is very large
untold.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a game that offers untold wealth to the most talented players
